summary.title: Professional Summary
paragraphs: I’m a Senior Data & AI Engineer specializing in scalable data architecture and LLM infrastructure. My work spans distributed compute (Spark, ECS/Fargate), cloud data platforms (AWS, Snowflake), and agentic AI pipelines built with LangGraph, LangChain, Milvus/pgvector, RAGAS, and reranker-driven retrieval.

I design and deploy multi-cloud ELT/ETL systems with event-driven ingestion, metadata-rich lakehouse layers, semantic indexing, and dbt-validated transformations. My retrieval work includes hybrid search (BM25 + dense embeddings), vector-store optimization, and latency-aware context selection for real-world RAG deployments.

On the production side, I focus on containerized orchestration, Terraform-driven IaC, CI/CD automation, cost-efficient Snowflake optimization, and observability tooling (Langfuse, CloudWatch). My systems support high-throughput analytics, feature reuse, and reliable LLM inference at enterprise scale.
My core principle: architect data and AI systems that are fast, reproducible, fault-tolerant, and ready for real deployment.

research_interests.title: Research Interests
items: Scalable data systems - cloud-native data platforms, distributed pipelines, and reliability-focused ETL/ELT design.
LLM system engineering - retrieval architecture, embedding optimization, reranking, and production-grade RAG pipelines.
Agentic AI workflows - stateful multi-step reasoning, autonomous planning loops, and orchestration logic.
Data-centric AI - embedding quality, evaluation frameworks, observability, and latency/cost diagnostics.
Applied machine learning - tabular modeling, synthetic data generation, credit-risk scoring, and predictive systems.
Edge and connected-device analytics - telematics pipelines, GPS integrity modeling, and adaptive data delivery.

items.title: VideoSemanticAlignment — Vision–Language Fine-Tuning Pipeline
items.description: Constructs a preprocessing and training workflow that cleans event-level textual descriptions, aligns them with corresponding video segments, and fine-tunes a vision–language model to associate visual content with narrative text, enabling supervised video-to-text semantic mapping for downstream inference. Fine-tuning and evaluations are nearly complete, and the team is preparing the peer-review manuscript for near-term publication.
items.tech_stack: Python, Vision–Language Models, Dataset Processing, LLM Fine-Tuning

items.title: ASTRA-X Overthinker — Autonomous Goal Iteration Engine
items.description: Orchestrates Markdown-defined goals into persona-aware, interval-scheduled LLM refinement loops with append-only progress journals and archival workflows.
items.tech_stack: Python 3.12, Flask, APScheduler, Docker, Markdown, Ollama/OpenAI

items.title: SynthScoreNet — Synthetic Credit Score Modeling (GANs)
items.description: Trains GANs on borrower attributes to generate synthetic credit populations and downstream score models for low-file-depth segments.

items.title: Domain-Adaptive GPT-2 Fine-Tuning
items.description: Fine-tunes GPT-2 on custom corpora with tokenizer customization and training pipelines for domain-specific text generation.

items.title: ReviewSentiments — App-Review Intelligence Pipeline
items.description: Builds an NLP pipeline for sentiment scoring, topic extraction, and feature-vector modeling on Google Play Store reviews.

items.title: ImageClassification — Transfer Learning with ResNet-18
items.description: Applies transfer learning on ResNet-18 with structured augmentation and training loops for high-accuracy image classification.

items.title: SecureLog — AWS SQS Log Ingestion Pipeline
items.description: Processes authentication logs from SQS into PostgreSQL with schema enforcement, idempotent consumers, and durable storage.

items.title: Location Selection via K-Means (Geospatial Analytics)
items.description: Uses K-Means clustering on geospatial features to discover commercial hotspots and analyze centroid-based catchment zones.

items.title: ForestFireEstimation — Burn-Area Prediction Model
items.description: Trains regression models on meteorological and environmental signals to estimate forest-fire burn area and error profiles.

items.title: GHG Emission Analysis — R-Based Climate Analytics
items.description: Performs tidyverse-based wrangling and visualization of national GHG emissions for temporal and cross-country diagnostics.

items.title: BlogSentimentAnalysis — Linguistic Polarity Pipeline
items.description: Runs polarity and subjectivity analysis on large blog corpora with token stats, sentiment scoring, and word-frequency views.

items.title: IMS — Telematics-Driven Insurance ML Pipeline
items.description: Engineers telematics features from driving behavior and trains supervised models to estimate insurance claim likelihood.

items.title: Credit Risk Scoring with XGBoost
items.description: Builds XGBoost-based credit-default predictors with class-balancing strategies and AUC-driven model selection.

items.title: COVID Trend Analysis — Time-Series Forecasting
items.description: Analyzes U.S. COVID-19 metrics and fits ARIMA-based models for trend projection and dashboard-ready time-series outputs.

items.title: Stock Data Analysis Tool — Seeking Alpha Integration
items.description: Aggregates KPI and growth metrics for multiple tickers via Seeking Alpha APIs with normalized DataFrame-based analytics.
